item.title: Scalability Essentials for APIs in High-Traffic Services
item.description: This article explores key strategies for ensuring the scalability of APIs in high-traffic services, particularly when dealing with a large user base. It covers essential practices for handling high-volume reads and writes in REST APIs backed by relational databases, focusing on optimization, caching, and database management to maintain performance in production environments.
